page.title: 01Gazetteer
page.content: Our area is mainly comprised of {Crowthorne and Little Sandhurst and {Sandhurst.} The former developed around the original railway station which was built to serve{Wellington {College.}Large areas of land around Crowthorne are still owned by the College - although some are now being developed. The broadleaf woodland makes this a very attractive area to the increasing population. { {Little Sandhurst}is really a developed village. It was only in the 1960's that this area started to grow because of private housing.However, there is no local industry apart from the gravel extraction in{Sandhurst which is the oldest village. There are some essential shops but the larger shopping complexes are to be found in {Wokingham,Bracknell or Reading.
